module.name: InformUnity Bitrix24
module.changelog: 15.0.1.20 -Fix: Deprecated way to add Console commands -Fix: context "macro-dial-one" on FreePBX less then 14 -Fix: ะก2ะก trunks order if route has several trunks on answer -Fix: trunks order if route has several trunks on answer 15.0.1.18 -Fix: Responsible route if priority not default 15.0.1.17 -Fix: Interface tables fixes 15.0.1.16 -Fix: find user ID on show|hide -Fix: trunks order if route has several trunks 15.0.1.15 -Fix: no call finish if route has several trunks 15.0.1.14 -Fix: Test call Registration -Fix: Call finish on failed Click to Call 15.0.1.13 -New: Entity selection on change owner -Fix: Exceptions on inbound 15.0.1.12 -Fix: card hiding on several PJSIP contacts with followme -Fix: no call finish if route has several trunks 15.0.1.11 -Fix: Addons 15.0.1.10 -Fix: instant finish on switch to next trunk -Fix: old ffprobe compatability 15.0.1.9 -Fix: exceptions on outbound call 15.0.1.8 -Fix: card hiding on several PJSIP contacts 15.0.1.7 -New: Add To Chat on Outbound calls 15.0.1.6 -Fix: Offline calls registration -New: Addon compatability option 15.0.1.5 -Fix: Changed license server URL 15.0.1.4 -New: Added new option into "Assign to Unanswered Call" 15.0.1.3 -Fix: Clear cache not remove astDB ca -Fix: Finish on missed outbound call to assigned manager 15.0.1.2 -Fix: OfflineCalls processing 15.0.1.1 -New: update CDR 15.0.1.0 -New: dialplan simplified -New: transfer fixes -New: Line number as a MASK -New: Parse SIP headers for updating just created lead -New: Improvements fore Add-ons -New: unregister module by adding #unregister in module url 15.0.0.34 -Fix: Module Backup -Fix: Recordings WAV format 15.0.0.33 -Fix: compatability with analytics -Fix: Identify the region for Russia -Fix: Module Backup 15.0.0.32 -Fix: Call finish on empty recording file 15.0.0.31 -Fix: Set user on outbound call 15.0.0.30 -Fix: Double call finish on ClickToCall -Fix: Regions list urls -Fix: Prefixes on route determination 15.0.0.29 -Fix: sending recordings to Bitrix24 restored 15.0.0.28 -Fix: Voting on inbound route, after transfer -Fix: Routing points "From" field fixed, now it shows all inbound routes -Fix: User definition on cancel outbound call 15.0.0.27 -Fix: Set user on outbound call -Fix: Creating lead on if disabled 15.0.0.26 -Fix: Use for IVR 15.0.0.25 -Fix: mp3 set to 192k 15.0.0.24 -Fix: !audio conversion now uses only Ffmpeg 15.0.0.23 -Fix: Stereo on outbound 15.0.0.22 -Fix: Links to records fore voicemail 15.0.0.21 -Fix: Attaching wrong audio after asterisk crashes -Fix: Links to records 15.0.0.20 -Fix: Change owner in attended transfer -Fix: Now, all recording file names are stored in mysql, till the end of the call. 15.0.0.19 -Fix: Task name fixed -New: Disable logging option in db 15.0.0.18 -Fix: Links to records 15.0.0.17 -Fix: call finish if operator were redirected to self phone 15.0.0.16 -Fix: improved stability 15.0.0.15 -Fix: adding accomplices and observers on task creation -New: disable logging 15.0.0.14 -Fix: removed all functions CHANNELS from dialplan -Fix: wrong responsible on call finish 15.0.0.13 -Fix: Hiding a card, on call answer with pjsip contacts more then one 15.0.0.12 -Fix: Prefixes on C2C 15.0.0.11 -Add: Added table search -Fix: Check in route usage, on cyclical routes -Fix: License date -Fix: C2C and Callback with "+" and prefix, now "+" will be removed 15.0.0.10 -Fix: Sow License expired state -Fix: Recordings with multiple audio files -Add: url hash option 'curl_proxy', to modify this option -Add: url hash opttion 'addon', to upload module extensions 15.0.0.9 -Fix: Issue with last slash in bitrix domain name 15.0.0.8 -Fix: cyrillic symbols in line number 15.0.0.7 -Fix: showing card when it disabled in routing point -Fix: Adding links to several records simultaneously 15.0.0.6 -Fix: display Lines 15.0.0.5 -Fix: Redirection -Fix: Outbound routes status changing 15.0.0.4 -Fix: Destinations detection -Fix: "Customer Relationship
